assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Showcase Inc. engages in the SaaS, advertisement and media, cloud integration, investment, and information and communications businesses in Japan. The company offers Omotenashi Suite DX for form creation that allows user to instantly link data from online procedures to existing systems; Omotenashi Suite CX that enables text communication through browser-based chat, LINE, and +messaging; NaviCast Form Assist, a tool for form optimization; NaviCast Form Converter, a mobile-focused form optimization service; and Omakase Analyst, a full website analysis and improvement service. It also provides Mail Checker for checking the existence of emails on a real-time basis to prevent conversion losses; License Reader, which automatically outputs personal information right inside form inputs, from photos of driver's licenses taken by smartphones; ID Checker, a SaaS-type e-KYC tool that verifies users identity through a smartphone browser; AI Masking that automatically masks the corresponding location of transmitted personal identification documentation image data; NaviCast Smartphone Converter, which converts desktop sites into smartphone versions; NaviCast Site Personalizer, a web-based hospitality-type service; and NaviCast CV Lift that provides a question-and-answer style questionnaire. In addition, the company offers bitWave and Sumaho-no-Susume to attract customers through advertisements; GOLF SAPURI, a web media which offers content about golf gear, techniques, practice methods, etc.; KIN-YU Lab., an information media that provides finance-related information; cody, a web media that explains the basics of programming languages, recommended programming schools, etc.; Money Pitch that provides information necessary to manage assets; Hikari Choice, which compares and recommends optical lines, affordable SIMs, Wi-Fi, and home routers; and PR automation that automates all PR tasks on a single platform. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
